summary: Project to refine subscription handling (including binder limit behavior) and integrate with Shopify.

existing_features.title: Add a Shopify-ready external upgrade link for Free users and surface it in the UI anywhere binder limits are communicated (e.g., the binder limit reached alert in the binder library and the disabled “New Binder” create dialog state). The link must be configurable (no hard-coded store URL) and must open in a new tab.

Improve subscription/binder-limit handling UX so that errors from backend binder-limit enforcement are shown as friendly, actionable English messages rather than raw trap strings, while preserving the underlying error details for debugging.

new_feature_requests.summary: Refine subscription handling, including expected binder limit behavior.
Integrate/link the product/service with Shopify (Shopify-ready integration).

projectName: Refine subscription handling and add Shopify-ready upgrade link
